elements module

elements.py contains the classes for the circuit elements: capacitors, inductors, and josephson junctions.

class elements.Capacitor(value=1e-20, cUnit='F', Q=None, error=0)[source]

Bases: object

class that contains the capacitor properties.

energy()[source]

returns the charging energy of the capacitor in Hz.

value(random: bool = False)[source]

returns the value of the capacitor in Farad units. If random flag is true, it samples from a normal distribution. inputs:

– random: A flag which specifies whether the output is picked deterministically or randomly.

class elements.Charge(value=0, noise=0)[source]

Bases: object

class that contains the charge offset properties.

value(random: bool = False)[source]

returns the value of charge bias. If random flag is true, it samples from a normal distribution. inputs:

– random: A flag which specifies whether the output is picked deterministically or randomly.

class elements.Flux(value=0, noise=0)[source]

Bases: object

class that contains the flux bias properties.

value(random: bool = False)[source]

returns the value of flux. If random flag is true, it samples from a normal distribution. inputs:

– random: A flag which specifies whether the output is picked deterministically or randomly.

class elements.Inductor(value, lUnit, cap=<elements.Capacitor object>, Q=None, error=0, loops=[])[source]

Bases: object

class that contains the inductor properties.

energy()[source]

returns the inductive energy of the inductor in Hz.

value(random: bool = False)[source]

returns the value of the inductor in Henry units. If random flag is true, it samples from a normal distribution. inputs:

– random: A flag which specifies whether the output is picked deterministically or randomly.

class elements.Junction(value, jUnit, cap=<elements.Capacitor object>, A_c=1e-07, x_qp=3e-06, error=0, loops=[])[source]

Bases: object

class that contains the Josephson Junction properties.

value(random: bool = False)[source]

returns the value of the Josephson Junction in angular frequency. If random flag is true, it samples from a normal distribution. inputs:

– random: A flag which specifies whether the output is picked deterministically or randomly.

class elements.Loop(value=0, A=0)[source]

Bases: object

class that contains the inductive loop properties.
